title: Project Management Competency Enhancement Program Using Virtual Learning Media

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational project management theory and practical experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based virtual learning environment implementation, emphasizing real-time collaboration activities linked with offline workshops

learning_goals: Learners establish and implement stakeholder management strategies through simulation-based projects in virtual learning media
Learners analyze team-specific project risks and develop response plans using mobile-based collaboration tools
Learners convert virtual learning experiences into actionable insights for practical application through reflective journaling

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
